analysis.key_quote: A change that would politicize the federal workforce in order to please POTUS would cause disruptive administration and a disservice to Americans who rely on their government and its civil servants for consistency across whichever representatives of political parties are entrusted to hold office.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the federal workforce and its negative impact on government consistency and service to the public.
